page.title: 04THE CROWLEES SCHOOLS
page.content: The first{Crowlees School}was built by the Church at the beginning of the 19 century. It grew in size and a further building was added.Due to further growth an additional school was built just over 100 years ago.The new{Lee {Green School}was used to accommodate girls & infants with {Crowlees}having only boys.At Easter 1972 the present 5-9 school was opened & one term later the old school closed.{Crowlees First {School}is a modern open plan brick building with 8 teaching bases each having a teaching area, quiet room, stock room,cloak room ,toilets,wet area & dining/activity area.The school also has a kitchen,hall & the usual staff and office accommodation.The school is set in extensive grounds.Due to falling rolls{Lee Green Sch.}closed about 4 years ago and many of the children came to the present school.
